title: 02/22/22 DPS Hour 2 - Rob Parker & Mike Harmon Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/22/22 DPS Hour 2 - Rob Parker & Mike Harmon Guest Hosting
description:
Rob Parker and Mike Harmon, in for Dan, discuss the various stories surrounding LeBron James after All-Star Weekend. The guys dive into LeBron's statement on wanting to play with Bronny, wherever he is drafted. Plus, the guys give their thoughts on the MLB CBA negotiations.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
